item.title: CBT inspired Data Analysis - part 1
item.description: This blogpost is about applying a mental-wellbeing coping technique called CBT to “data analysis worrying”. Let’s say you get a new project handed over; some kind of data analysis. What do you feel: Do you feel a) excitement of getting hands onto new data or b) anxiety that this project may stumble accross all the data science mistakes that one can possibly make? I feel both of these things. I am always delighted about a) because it means that I still like my work.
